name: Interferon-Gamma (Standard)
description: Medical drug. Effective anti-viral and anti-cancer treatment. Single dose stops most viral infections.

name: Interferon-Gamma (Extended)
description: Extended release version effective for 7 days. For colonization in hostile disease environments.

name: MetabolX Plus
description: Recreational drug with stimulant effects. Enhanced metabolism, DM+1 to Physical tasks for 4 hours. Addiction risk (8+).

name: MetabolX Elite
description: Premium stimulant with stronger effects. DM+2 to Physical tasks for 6 hours. Higher addiction risk (6+).

name: Phiadrenaline
description: Combat drug. Increases adrenaline surge. Grants +2 to attacks and combat initiative for 1 hour. Side effects: tremors, exhaustion.

name: Radox (Anti-Radiation)
description: Radiation treatment. Grants +2 to END checks against radiation sickness. Most effective within 1 hour of exposure.

name: Vasopressin-Y
description: Spacer aid. Reduces the physiological degradation of zero-G exposure. A spacer on Vasopressin-Y for 10+ years shows negligible aging.

name: Panacea
description: Universal healing stimulant. Grants DM+1 to healing rolls. Stimulates biological recovery across most medical conditions.

name: Combat Cocktail
description: Military pharmaceutical. +1 damage to melee attacks and +1 to Tactics. DM+2 to staying conscious. Duration 2 hours.
